head.supplied: Estimates of Expenditure for 1893/4 ¶ Division No 17 ¶ Government Botanist ¶ Ferd. von Mueller, ¶ ¶ Govt. Botanist...

div.p: V93/3407, unit 731, VPRS 3991/P inward registered correspondence, VA 475 Chief Secretary's Department, Public Record Office, Victoria.

To proof.
MS written by Georg Luehmann and signed by M. Estimates of Expenditure for 1893/4

Government Botanist
See also M to T. Wilson, 26 April 1893.

Government Botanist
This is marked with an asterisk and annotated lower on the page: 'Provides office-rooms and pays for all Contingencies.'

1st Herbarium Assistant
This is marked with two asterisks and annotated lower on the page: 'Awaiting transfer to an other Department'.

cell.style: padding-left: 0.0556in; padding-right: 0.0556in; padding-top: 0in; padding-bottom: 0in; border-left: 0.75pt solid #000000; border-right: none; border-top: none; border-bottom: none;
cell.p:
239
This is marked with a cross and annotated in an unknown hand: 'Since reduced by £40 by P. S. Board'. [Public Service Board.]
